---
title: "References"
---

This is not a complete list of references, but rather some that you may find handy while learning reproduction assessments.

### Oocyte morphology and stages

[Grier et al 2009](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1XPBpsYk76ZMDnJyL5BQ7HuNaCDIU5YRW/view?usp=sharing). The ovary, folliculogenesis, and oogenesis in teleosts.

[Grier et al 2018](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1H6SHT_L-UIuygzl_JFedUgUgJ4nmSlml/view?usp=sharing)  Oocyte Development and Staging in the Florida Bass, *Micropterus floridanus* (LeSueur, 1822), with Comments on the Evolution of Pelagic and Demersal Eggs in Bony Fishes. Reference has detailed images of oocyte morphology.

[McMillen 2007](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1nZd2RUWvJCD9BJEgyc00mns1ivRrgBvz/view?usp=sharing) Female reproductive systems.

[Wallace & Selman 1981](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1U8RQSfAVVWFBEAMZLLnptmqI1CMr1HLe/view?usp=sharing) Cellular and dynamic aspects of oocyte growth in teleosts.

### Spermatogenesis
[Schulz et al. 2009](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1V9tL-VxQgIoSnTi51Q7cYrw8CcpddzJN/view?usp=sharing) Spermatogenesis in fish.

### Hermaphroditism 
[Sadovy & Shapiro 1987](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fLUxT0uDDrm3CNn49kC_OdP0bU_MqThk/view?usp=sharing) Criteria for the diagnosis of hermaphroditism in fishes.

[Nakamura et al. 2005](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1chL2Pej0zzzHkPX222tPiee0ufGn2RRp/view?usp=sharing) Sex chagne in coral reef fish.

### Fecundity

[Thorsen & Kjesbu 2001](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1FC3NSAcdem6_QEwQT1cykpFt0ycqxGs0/view?usp=sharing) A rapid method for estimation of oocyte size and potential fecundity.

[Arthur et al 2022](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1l1Ax4BFxslA-mUAEpvelS7mkQSsPez0F/view?usp=sharing) Alaskan Yelloweye Rockfish Fecundity Revealed through an Automated Egg Count and Digital Imagery Method.
